basics.name: Huan Nguyen
basics.label: Senior Developer
basics.summary: I am a senior developer with over 8 years of experience in web development and strong English communication skills.

highlights: * Worked on a team of 5 developers to develop a web application for a client.
work.summary:
• Description: Content Management System | Customer: US | Team about: 100 and development team has 20 members.
  • Responsibilities: Build api and integrate api.
  • Technologies: NodeJS, reactjs.
